trans-unit.source: Iterates over all child elements with a matching name.
trans-unit.target: 逐一查看具有相符名稱的所有子項目。

trans-unit.source: The node from which you start traversing child elements.
trans-unit.target: 您啟動周遊子項目節點。

trans-unit.source: The state of the navigator changes only if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ElementContentIterator.MoveNext%2A> method has returned `true`.
trans-unit.target: 導覽器 的變更只有當狀態<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ElementContentIterator.MoveNext%2A>方法已傳回`true`。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ElementContentIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Positions the iterator on the next child element with a matching name.
trans-unit.target: 將 iterator 置於下一個子元素名稱相符。

trans-unit.source: If the iterator was set to the next child element with the matching name, the MoveNext method sets the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ElementContentIterator.Current%2A> property to the current result navigator; otherwise, the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ElementContentIterator.Current%2A> property remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: MoveNext 方法如果迭代器已設定為下一個子元素具有相符名稱，設定<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ElementContentIterator.Current%2A>屬性目前的結果巡覽器; 否則<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ElementContentIterator.Current%2A>屬性維持不變。</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ElementContentIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.ElementContentIterator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the iterator was set to the next child element with the matching name; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果迭代器已設定為下一個子元素具有相符的名稱。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
